description: This file defines data models for grocery items and lists, sets up an agent with a MistralChat model to extract structured information from an image of a restaurant bill, and invokes the agent to process a specific image URL.

classes.name: GroceryItem
classes.description: Data model representing a grocery item with name and price.

classes.name: GroceryListElements
classes.description: Data model representing a grocery list with bill number, items, and total price.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to invoke the agent to process the image and extract structured data.
